title: Rito PLS: i need 37 RP

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: give me 37 RP for awsome skin so i can win games :^)

replies.body: Blood Moon looks both virtuous and fabulous. :D I'd go as far to suggest adding a cape! Some poros may have added the RP to your account, may all your games be awesome. :D
